Name: Conscientious
Description: taking time to do things right

Name: Creative
Description: someone who can make up things easily or think of new things

Name: Perfectionist
Description: wants everything to be done right and perfectly

Name: Precise
Description: careful and with great attention to detail

Name: Careless
Description: not being careful; rushing into things

Name: Lazy
Description: unwilling to work or showing a lack of effort

Name: Rigid
Description: being unwilling to change one's outlook, belief, or response
